text:
It's not always possible, but I ask for a single point of contact who's responsible for resolving conflicting comments/discussion.

So, for one client I have: CEO hired me and appointed the content manager to manage my work. The CEO, head of client relationships, and content manager all weigh in on the docs I send, but the content manager is responsible for making sure I know what I need to do from there.
